data.comment: Today's referee, Danny Makkelie, has blown to start the match.
Tommy St. Jago (Utrecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 21, Kenneth Paal is booked for the home team.
Justin Hoogma (Utrecht) has replaced the possibly injured Willem Janssen at Mac3Park Stadion.
Django Warmerdam puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Dean Huiberts (Zwolle) has received a yellow card from Danny Makkelie.
In the minute 59, Goal! Mimoun Mahi levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Gyrano Kerk to set up the goal.
Zwolle make their first substitution with Jesper Drost replacing Mustafa Saymak.
In the minute 67, John Stegeman is making the team's second substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with Rico Strieder replacing Dean Huiberts.
Marc Olivier Doue is on a sub for Sam Kersten for Zwolle.
Adrian Dalmau is replacing Mimoun Mahi for the away team.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Joris Overeem with Sander Van de Streek.
The home team replace Eliano Reijnders with Mike Van Duinen.
Thomas Lam (Zwolle) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Simon Gustafson (Utrecht) gets a yellow card.
Eljero Elia is replacing Bart Ramselaar for Utrecht at Mac3Park Stadion.
Utrecht's Eljero Elia has been booked in Zwolle.
Danny Makkelie blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
